subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Teenagers and Adolescence
lead_paragraph: Mike Perham, a 17-year-old Briton, became the youngest person to sail solo around the world, surpassing a 17-year-old Californian who had recently set the record.
snippet: Mike Perham, a 17-year-old Briton, became the youngest person to sail solo around the world, surpassing a 17-year-old Californian who had recently set the record.
